forest.translate: лес, заповедник, заказник, лесной, засаживать лесом
mnemonic: forest [фо'рист] лес - (А - форист*) в лесу от полиции прячется (*Аферист).
examples: The fox lit out for the forest.
We walked deep into the forest.
The forest stretches for miles.
The scenery showed a forest.
Fires destroyed acres of forest.
the biology of the rain forest
make one's way into the forest
The road goes through the forest.
The forest surrounds my property.
The road strikes into the forest.
the endless forest that the first European settlers encountered
Follow the track into the forest.
the birds and beasts of the forest
We found a clearing in the forest.
Preserve the forest and the lakes.
Thick forest stood on either hand.
The track led through dense forest.
The forest was filled with birdsong.
efforts to save a deteriorating rain forest
They dwelt in the forest.
beat a path through the forest
We entered into a noble forest.
Fires swept through the forest.
a burned-over site in the forest
a lonely trek through the forest
The road cuts through the forest.
the forest's plant life (=plants)
Light pierced through the forest.
The fire spared the forest floor.
The forest has been heavily logged.
example_translate: нескончаемые леса, c которыми столкнулись первые европейские поселенцы
Идите в лес по этой дорожке.
По обе стороны стоял дремучий лес.
